title: Adamant mace

properties.name: description
properties.value: An adamant mace is a mace that requires level 30 Attack to wield. Players can make an adamant mace with the Smithing skill at level 72 using 1 Adamant bar, giving 62.5 Smithing experience. Players can purchase this mace from Flynn's Mace Market in Falador or the weapons shop in the Warriors' Guild, and is also dropped by Twisted Banshees.

Item ID1430

An adamant mace is a mace that requires level 30 Attack to wield. Players can make an adamant mace with the Smithing skill at level 72 using 1 Adamant bar, giving 62.5 Smithing experience. Players can purchase this mace from Flynn's Mace Market in Falador or the weapons shop in the Warriors' Guild, and is also dropped by Twisted Banshees.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
21 April 2021
(update)

The mace's attack speed has been decreased from 5 (every 3.0 seconds) to 4 (every 2.4 seconds).
